title: The new system is rigged - Part 2
body:
Yay! I'm here to say that I hate the new system with blue essence. Because 1. The only way to get all the champs now is to pay! And 2. I have 4791 BE! I need 9 more! But I need to level up. If the ip system was there, I could have gotten the champ I want today! But no. I have to wait until Saturday or Sunday or even Monday. 
TL;DR Switch back to the old ip system.

replies.body: Between this and the insta 14 day suspensions being handed out like candy, riot are doing a lot of damage to their brand with existing customers . Suspect the strategy is to milk new players and turn off the old players. Looks like they are spring cleaning.

> Suspect the strategy is to milk new players and turn off the old players. Looks like they are spring cleaning.

Or they are just forcing you to create new accounts that you cant do shit on unless you give them a few $$$ so you can enjoy your "Free to Play" game.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=agZ0HggL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-11-21T22:07:27.719+0000)
>
> Do they realise they haven't gotten a new player in like 3 years?

If i were riot I'd be nurturing the existing population in an environment where new players (as distinct from new accounts) are on the decline. 

What they seem to be doing is punishing swear words but ignoring bots and trolls while simultaneously erecting barriers to play for new players with the be system.

Can only assume that gauging a smaller number of players more thoroughly is an accounting strategy to retain an acceptable level of profitability for tenecents recent aquisition.  Ea tried that with sim city, dungeon keeper and swbf2 - they killed those games by making monetisation the focus rather than game play. It sounds good to accountants and consultants but when you screw your players the numbers dont materialise and you're left with a dead game. Such a shame because riot really had the best ftp model.
Yeah because a lot of people don't understand that "whales" might make your games, but the "whales" get bored when no one else is playing, "whales" don't like playing by themselves.

Tbh, the only good years in league were 2014 and before. 
Now, they're losing their playerbase.
edit: years not year
edit 2: were not was
I've only been here since season 2 (before OCE existed), and I have never seen LoL in a worse state than it is in now.

Personally i played a little in season 2 or 3, not sure which (i didn't enjoy the Ping for NA before the OCE server so i didn't really get into it.)

But played a decent amount since Season 4 (OCE exists) and honestly, i feel it's been getting worse every year.

And it will only continue to get worse and worse, because Tencent's focus for Rito game is milking this shit dry before it just dies.

I joined in early season 6. And I got a few champions during that timeframe, but not many after I realised how boring playing mid was. So basically I'm trying to get jungle champs now.
Someone worked out on Reddit that to unlock all champions, if you end up getting the average amount of BE, then it would take you 200+ levels.
And just so we are clear, you aren't going to get the average amount of BE.
That strengthens my point even more! It's just absurd!

200 levels. Grinding, here we come. 
_10 hours later_   
1 level done! 200 hours left!
_10 years later_
Finally! 200 levels! 
Oh. I just wasted my life.
